A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some truly great moments in the movie\, but I left feeling ultimately confused. I think the film suffered due to the change in director. Johnson didn't care for the hype\, story or lore of 7 and \"tossed it behind his back\". \n\nA shame for Star Wars fans as no questions were answered. The only thing to redeem this film will be episode 9.
